TopicTitle: New Tech, New prototypes, New concepts, New Stuff!

Articles.Content:
I was looking for a thread to post this, since it seems like a neat proof-of-concept, but I didn't see an appropriate looking thread in the first few pages of this sub-forum. So I thought I'd create a new thread for "New Stuff." So post the neat new gadgetry you find here!

Meh, the premise of this thread is rather silly, so...
